scenes.background: Monica raises an eyebrow, looking at you and Bob.
scenes.description: 'I get that we need to be cautious, but can't we speed things up a bit?'

options.text: We could try to be more efficient without compromising on quality.
options.analysis: You propose a balanced approach, showing good perception and self-regulation, while maintaining empathy towards both viewpoints.

options.text: Maybe we can streamline some steps to accommodate both speed and caution.
options.analysis: You suggest a compromise, showing empathy and social skill by trying to meet both needs.

options.text: Speeding things up might increase the risk of errors. Are we ready for that?
options.analysis: You emphasize the potential risks of rushing, showing higher motivation but lower empathy towards Monicaâ€™s urgency.
